com.paydiant.android.core.service

Interface ILoyaltyManagerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoyaltyManagerService

    public interface ILoyaltyManagerService
    This interface defines the services required for loyalty management.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Since:
    3.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Detail

      • isRegisteredForLoyalty

        LoyaltyStatus isRegisteredForLoyalty()
        Checks if is registered for loyalty.
        Returns:
        the loyalty registration status.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.

      • retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData

        GlobalProfileMetaData retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData()
        Retrieve the list of loyalty global profile meta data, that needs to be populated and submitted when registering for loyalty programs.
        Returns:
        the Profile meta-data containing the attributes required to populate and submit for loyalty registration.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.

      • registerCustomerForLoyalty

        void registerCustomerForLoyalty(CustomerProfileDataList customerProfileDataList)
        Register the customer for loyalty programs.
        Parameters:
        customerProfileDataList - A CustomerProfileDataList containing the list of LoyaltyProfileData objects populated with values for the respective data types.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        417(EXPECTATION_FAILED) - Profile Data Missing.
        421(DESTINATION_LOCKED) - Customer Already Registered.
        500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.
        See Also:
        retrieveLoyaltyGlobalProfileMetaData()

      • retrieveMyLoyaltyPrograms

        LoyaltyProgramList retrieveMyLoyaltyPrograms()
        Retrieve my loyalty programs.
        Returns:
        the list of loyalty programs.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.

      • retrieveAvailableLoyaltyPrograms

        LoyaltyProgramList retrieveAvailableLoyaltyPrograms()
        Retrieve available loyalty programs.
        Returns:
        the list of loyalty programs.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.

      • retrieveLoyaltyProgram

        LoyaltyProgram retrieveLoyaltyProgram(String loyaltyProgramUri)
        Retrieve loyalty program by URI.
        Parameters:
        loyaltyProgramUri - loyalty program URI.
        Returns:
        the loyalty program.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        404(NOT_FOUND) - Loyalty program not found.
        500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.

      • refreshPointsBalance

        LoyaltyPointsBalance refreshPointsBalance(String loyaltyProgramUri)
        Refreshes the loyalty program's points balance.
        Parameters:
        loyaltyProgramUri - URI of the loyalty program to refresh points.
        Returns:
        the point balance.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        404(NOT_FOUND) - Loyalty program not found.
        500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.

      • retrieveLoyaltyPointsForTransaction

        AccrualActivityList retrieveLoyaltyPointsForTransaction(String paydiantRefId)
        Retrieve loyalty points for a transaction.
        Parameters:
        paydiantRefId - the Paydiant reference id.
        Returns:
        the list of accrual activities.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        404(NOT_FOUND) - Transaction not found.
        500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.

      • recordExternalActivity

        AccrualActivityList recordExternalActivity(ExternalActivity externalActivity)
        Records an external activity associated with the loyalty programs.
        Parameters:
        externalActivity - external activity details.
        Returns:
        the list of accrual activities.
        Throws:
        PaydiantException - in case of an error occurs, PaydiantException or one of its subclasses with the following status codes will be thrown.

        500(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) - Internal server error occurred.
